tronMcpServer.title: TRON Mcp Server
tronMcpServer.subtitle: TRON blockchain interaction layer for AI agents

openclawExtension.title: OpenClaw Extension
openclawExtension.subtitle: Tools that enable onchain payment capabilities for OpenClaw agents

hero.title: AI-Powered Banking Solutions
hero.subtitle: AiBank is a Web3-enabled SDK for AI agents, integrating payment protocols, server interfaces, and extension plugins to enable secure onchain operations, automated payments, and extensible capabilities.

seeItInAction.title: See It In Action
seeItInAction.subtitle_part1: With AiBank integrated, OpenClaw agents can autonomously manage assets, handle payments, and interact with blockchain. Please visit

features.title: Web3-Native Features
features.subtitle: Web3 infrastructure layer for AI agents, making blockchain interaction a native capability.

safeBalance.title: Onchain Asset Management
safeBalance.content: Enables AI agents to hold wallets, check balances, and transfer tokens with true asset custody.

instantTransfers.title: x402 Payment
instantTransfers.content: Agents autonomously handle pay-per-use requests with automatic payment authorization and execution.

smartContractCalls.title: Smart Contract Interaction
smartContractCalls.content: Provides unified blockchain interface for agents to read onchain data and invoke smart contracts.

payPerUse.title: TRC-8004 Trustless Collaboration
payPerUse.content: Enables trustless agent collaboration through verifiable on-chain identity and reputation.

step1.title: Open Bank Account
step1.content: Configure TRON private key to create onchain identity and operation permissions for agents.

step2.title: Configure Capabilities
step2.content: Install TronMcpServer to grant agents TRON onchain interaction capabilities.

step3.title: Select Skills
step3.content: Install extended capability modules like X402 Skills, SunSwap Skills, etc. as needed.

warning.left: AiBank is experimental and under active development. AiBank is not responsible for data loss or security intrusions. Please ensure your private keys are secure.
